column9: Really delicious pizzas. Might be the best pizza place in Lund. They provide tasty food and good service all the time. This restaurant is located close to a soccer filed called Smörlyckan and also close to Victoria Stadium which is a an indoor sport facility....More
Pretty good, thin crust pizza. This restaurant is owned and operated by a friendly Turkish family, and they will go out of their way to make you happy.
